import React, { useState } from "react"; import Signup from "../signup/Signup"; import styles from "./login.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Login = ()=>{ const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userData')); console.log(user); const [formData,setformData] = useState({ Email:'', Password:'' }); const handleInputChange = (e)=>{ const {name,value} = e.target; setformData({ ...formData,[name]:value, }); } const handlelogin = (e)=>{ } return <> Login Page
hello

} export default Login;
